text_logic_form: Find the area of the trapezoid.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the area of the trapezoid $ABCD$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $DC$ is $15$ units.
The length of the line $AD$ is $6$ units.
The length of the line $AB$ is $17$ units.
The line $DC$ is perpendicular to the line $AD$.
The line $AD$ is perpendicular to the line $AB$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AD$, $BC$, and $DC$, forming the trapezoid $ABCD$.
